fullText: Marisa Tomei brings a feral intensity to the role of Serafina, the Sicilian widow whose passionate nature is both her blessing and her curse.
dtliExcerpt: Marisa Tomei brings a feral intensity to the role of Serafina, the Sicilian widow whose passionate nature is both her blessing and her curse.
